channel.title: The Aetherway on Aetherway
channel.description: Recent content in The Aetherway on Aetherway

item.title: Big Boy
item.description: In the local tavern, you could always find Iron. Raised by the elderly on the outskirts of the Hive, he dressed and cut his hair like an old man, with innocent, chubby, rosy cheeks‚Äîhence the nickname ‚ÄúBig Boy.‚Äù He was as big as a soldier, though he wasn‚Äôt assigned as one, and was gentle despite his imposing size. Proud and passionate about his people‚Äôs history and culture, he was often seen singing anthems or playing melodies on the war horn he always wore around his neck. His songs would echo through the tavern amid the noise of chatter, laughter, and clinking glasses: ‚ÄúPon pon pon pon,‚Äù he‚Äôd cheerfully boom. When asked, he‚Äôd share his controversial views, which were regularly challenged. They all knew what he was, and so did he, but he treated everyone with kindness.

item.title: Ping Pong Hall
item.description:
Meanwhile, in Some Dimension‚Ä¶

There‚Äôs a hall of people playing ping pong against mirrors. Unnoticed in the back, a duo plays together.

item.title: Owl People
item.description:
Meanwhile, in Some Dimension‚Ä¶

We finally arrived at the museum where the owl people lived. We had all brought gifts for them, as it was typically polite to do so. Overwhelmed by the variety of objects, they rotated their heads completely and, ignoring our presence, kept them fixed toward their backs.

‚ÄúThe owl people feel comfortable when they are surrounded by things that remind them of their past,‚Äù the guide said. ‚ÄúThey can only look back because they see no future,‚Äù she concluded.

item.title: Re-Entering the Hive
item.description:
As Fire waited in line to re-enter the Hive, he spotted Boulder among the guards on duty. Assigned by birth as a soldier, Boulder had been raised alongside him, though they‚Äôd always had a distant relationship. Fed a different diet than the rest, Boulder was much bigger and tougher-looking. Fire hated his arrogant, overconfident, perpetually-in-challenge-mode face. He would have much rather met someone he didn‚Äôt know.

‚ÄúRaise your arms!‚Äù Boulder said, holding a club in his right hand and avoiding eye contact.

item.title: Tattooless Tattooer
item.description:
Fire arrived early at the tavern. Besides the owner, the only other person there was Water, the local tattoo enchanter. Sitting with his back to the bar, Water offered Fire some of his Queen‚Äôs Reserve honeydew liquor. Fire accepted out of politeness and sat beside him, his stomach churning. Although Water was a familiar figure, they hadn‚Äôt spoken before, and Fire struggled to find a topic.

‚ÄúYou do tattoos for a living, right?‚Äù

item.title: The Fall of the Tomato Civilization
item.description:
Meanwhile, in Some Dimension‚Ä¶

As I wandered through eerie ruins, I spotted a red figure in the distance. I waved, and they waved back, so I approached. He had a long beard, a staff, and looked like a dried tomato. I asked, ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs up?‚Äù

He began a story about how green tomatoes once played there, but a disagreement over whether to say ‚Äúto-MAY-toh‚Äù or ‚Äúto-MAH-toh‚Äù tore the community apart. Friends became enemies, and civil war broke out. ‚ÄúCherries were the first to go,‚Äù he lamented. The real twist? The leaders, who fueled the conflict, were secretly running a ketchup business‚Äîand were the same person, disguised with a fake mustache.

item.title: The Great Vibe Blackout
item.description:
Meanwhile, in Some Dimension‚Ä¶

A mysterious event occurred once, halting interdimensional vibe transmission for hours. Bored, people turned to those nearby for entertainment. Some of the best books were conceived, and even wars were paused. Despite the disruption, it‚Äôs fondly remembered by those who experienced it. Once transmissions resumed, life quickly returned to normal.

item.title: The Wallet
item.description:
Fire found a wallet lying on the ground. ‚ÄúSir, is this yours?‚Äù he called out to a scruffy-looking guy who was glancing around nervously.

The man looked left and right before responding, ‚Äú‚Ä¶Yes?‚Äù he said hesitantly.

Fire smirked. ‚ÄúOh, there‚Äôs an ID in here‚Ä¶‚Äù He pulled it out, holding it up next to the man‚Äôs face for a moment, clearly showing that the two didn‚Äôt match at all. ‚ÄúAre you‚Ä¶ Blibers Flobers?‚Äù

item.title: Chest-shaped Heart
item.description:
Meanwhile, in Some Dimension‚Ä¶

Amid the crowd, a little girl fixated on a heart-shaped object. After hours of holding it, she sat beside me, still staring. I asked, ‚ÄúIs this a chest?‚Äù

‚ÄúYes, it‚Äôs my heart,‚Äù she said.

‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs inside?‚Äù

‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know; I don‚Äôt have the key.‚Äù

‚ÄúBut there‚Äôs no lock‚Äîit‚Äôs open.‚Äù

‚ÄúOoooh,‚Äù she whispered.

item.title: Wings of Doom
item.description: On a hot summer night, Fire ventured into the heart of the forest, searching for Wind at the place where they had promised to meet after their metamorphosis. Fire had always thought of Wind as a younger brother, and it had been four years since they‚Äôd last seen each other. Both had recently gone through their pupal stage, a time of transformation that all Hive People undergo. The air was thick with anticipation; Fire could hear only the gentle rustling of leaves and the sound of his own footsteps through the vegetation. Soon, however, he heard a faint sound‚Äîa cry echoing through the trees. Fire called out for Wind several times, but only silence responded.

item.title: Fire Explains His Creative Process
item.description:
Meanwhile in His Dimension

When the Queen is mad,

Everyone can feel it.

When something goes wrong,

‚ÄúMother must be mad today,‚Äù

That‚Äôs what they say.

You know, this vibe everyone in the Hive connects to.

Some of us‚Äîwell, I know I can‚Äî

feel what Mother is feeling.

But what if I told you there are other vibes you can tune in to?

item.title: Floating Heart
item.description:
Meanwhile, in Some Dimension‚Ä¶

And there it was: the center of the stage, where everyone dreams to be, yet only a few dare to be inevitably consumed by its flames. A girl offered her heart, they took everything else but that.

item.title: Fire Defeats the Broken Thing
item.description:
Meanwhile in His Dimension

In Fire‚Äôs existence, something was always perpetually broken.

No matter how many times he tried to fix it, it would hold together only for a moment‚Äîbefore breaking again.

He examined the broken thing from every angle. ‚ÄúWhy does it keep falling apart?‚Äù he wondered.

It shouldn‚Äôt have been broken, yet it was. Always in the way, always failing. ‚ÄúWas that why it was discarded so easily? Like someone else had already given up?‚Äù

item.title: Labeland
item.description:
Meanwhile, in Some Dimension‚Ä¶

Navigating through the green hills, I‚Äôve arrived at this place where giant label makers were placed. People would approach them, get a label on themselves, and proceed to the next label maker. The process would repeat endlessly. Some had their bodies completely covered.

On top of the hill, a figure without a single label observed the scene with a happy face. I sat by his side and asked, ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs happening here?‚Äù

item.title: Familiarity Fatigue
item.description:
Everything he could carry fit into that backpack. Fire leapt into his land sail vehicle, unfurled the sail, and pulled the rope tight against his chest. It was a serene, silent Dawn Day, with a gentle breeze brushing against his face. Before slipping on his goggles, he took one last look at the Hive, its mounds looming quietly in the distance.

‚ÄúAs a larva, the Hive felt endless‚Äîevery crevice a world, every sound a mystery. My first venture into the tunnels was thrilling, full of discovery. But now? It feels small, predictable. Maybe I‚Äôve changed, not the Hive.‚Äù

item.title: Giant Rat
item.description:
Meanwhile, in Some Dimension‚Ä¶

In the center of the castle, there was a giant, old, and dirty rat, surrounded by treasures of all kinds.

‚ÄúIt eats cool ideas and poops out old and lame ones. The more it eats, the fatter, lazier, and stinkier it gets.‚Äù

‚ÄúWhy do they keep feeding it?‚Äù I asked.

‚ÄúIt wasn‚Äôt always like that. Its poop was once fresh. People got too emotionally attached to it, and now they don‚Äôt want to address the stink.‚Äù

item.title: Spiral
item.description:
On a Midnight Day, the Captain sat atop the Red Walker‚Äôs head, leaning against the beast‚Äôs thick fur for support. His usual determined, slightly stern expression remained fixed as he gripped the ropes for steering. In the distance, hundreds of legionaries marched in a synchronized mill formation, their footsteps a faint hum, mingling with the low murmur of voices carried by the wind.

The Captain removed his hat and placed it over his chest, his voice low with quiet sympathy. ‚ÄúPoor things,‚Äù he murmured.

item.title: Your Reflection Isn't You
item.description:
Meanwhile, in Some Dimension‚Ä¶

I was walking through a colonnade, surrounded by what appeared to be shallow waters. In the distance, more colonnades stretched into the horizon, their reflections rippling in the water. Beyond them, the landscape was sparse‚Äîperhaps some small trees, but little else. The sunlight was direct and bright, as if it were around noon. Other people walked there too, though whether they were visitors or inhabitants was unclear.

item.title: Bargain
item.description:
The Master of Materialization had been a recurring customer of the Captain‚Äôs services for decades, yet their exchanges always carried a peculiar tension. From the top of the Giant Red Walker‚Äôs head, under the dim, shifting hues of a Night Day, their conversation took a strange turn.

‚ÄúI hear you‚Äôre the best Captain alive. Is that true?‚Äù the Master asked, his voice smooth, almost mocking.

The Captain barely glanced at him, his tone dismissive. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs just talk.‚Äù

item.title: Disposable
item.description: Seating on the floor and resting her head against the bed, Lady Spiral desperately cried, her sobs echoing softly through the room. The Queen appeared in the doorway, her presence filling the space. ‚ÄúOh honey, don‚Äôt cry. Mama is here for you,‚Äù she cooed, kneeling beside Spiral. She stroked her hair gently, fingers threading through the strands in a soothing rhythm, but nothing could stem Spiral‚Äôs grief. Her sobs continued, unrelenting.

item.title: Rooftop
item.description:
Meanwhile, in This Dimension‚Ä¶

Water and Fire lounged on the rooftop after school, sipping drinks from a vending machine, soaking in the Friday vibes as the sun dipped toward the horizon. The world felt alive around them, the warm glow of the setting sun casting long shadows and igniting the sky with hues of orange and purple.

Fire broke the comfortable silence. ‚ÄúYou know, for a moment‚Ä¶ after I got hit by that truck, all those dreams I had while I was unconscious felt so real. That world‚Ä¶ it felt like the real one. But as I recovered, those memories started to fade, replaced by everything here. I just‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt know, I feel like I don‚Äôt belong.‚Äù

item.title: Lady Thread's Leap
item.description:
Meanwhile, in This Dimension‚Ä¶

Fire returns to an abandoned theme park, a place once filled with energy and laughter. The layout is unchanged, but the park feels empty, stripped of the life it once knew. Most of the attractions have been dismantled and sold for scrap, leaving only rusting remains. Nature, uninvited, has begun to reclaim the area, creeping over decaying rides and structures.

As he wanders through the silence, Fire encounters a girl. Like him, she seems drawn to the park for reasons they can barely explain. He doesn‚Äôt remember her, but she insists she remembers him. She wears a Japanese sailor school uniform, and her long braid swings behind her as she moves. Together, they spend the day exploring the desolate attractions, lost in the haze of forgotten memories.

item.title: Never Forgotten
item.description: Fire opened the door to the room where all the pieces created by students over the years were kept. His eyes immediately fell on a piece made by a close friend. Scenes of its creation flashed in his mind‚Äî all the struggles, but also the moments of mutual support. ‚ÄúWhat was his name again?‚Äù He had left a long time ago, without saying goodbye, without looking back. ‚ÄúI wonder where he is now,‚Äù Fire thought. One by one, talented colleagues silently faded away. As he walked through the room, he wondered: how many of them had given up, disappearing into thin air? How many were still around?

item.title: Ant Hill
item.description:
Meanwhile, in This Dimension‚Ä¶

After school, on her way home, Zero crouched by an ant hill, watching as the tiny workers tirelessly carried pebbles out of their tunnels, each moving with purpose. A few feet away, she noticed hundreds of ants swarming around a lollipop, likely dropped by some careless kid earlier.

‚ÄúThey‚Äôre fascinating,‚Äù she murmured to herself.

She gently reached into a nearby puddle, trying to rescue an ant struggling to stay afloat.

item.title: Hacker
item.description:
Meanwhile, in Some Dimension‚Ä¶

Fire finds himself in a featureless white room. In the center, a girl sits at a desk, working on a computer, wearing cute pastel-colored pajamas adorned with the many expressions of a recognizable cartoon character. She looks as though she‚Äôs just freshened up after a bath. Her fingers tap frenetically across the keyboard, filling the room with a rapid, satisfying rhythm in midst of the continuous humming sound of cooling fans, electrical buzzes and hard drive noises.

item.title: The Day Before the Coronation
item.description:
Meanwhile, in That Dimension‚Ä¶

It was the Night Day just before the Coronation Ceremony. Feeling down, Zero sat on a bench on the Hive, quietly observing the frenetic preparations for the day ahead. The Hive buzzed with life, its intricate network of corridors glowing faintly with a soft amber hue, amplifying the sense of anticipation.

A strange girl sat beside her. She looked different, like an outsider. Her attire shimmered with colors that shifted with her movements, and on her head sat a peculiar ‚Äútiara‚Äù that, to Zero, seemed to whisper faint, ethereal music.

item.title: Aetherap (4Kids Opening Theme)
item.description:
This story‚Äôs about Fire, fierce and untamed,
In That Dimension, where the rules are all changed.
He dreams of more, to reshape creation,
To rise as the God of Materialization!

But the world fights back, it won‚Äôt obey,
The weave unravels in disarray!
Reality snaps, the threads unwind,
A twist so wild, it fractures time!

Now the path is wrecked, no turning back,
New challengers step up‚Äîready to attack!

Lady Zero, fearless, takes the lead,
Dives into fate with unshaken speed!

Lady Entanglement, genius, watch her break the code,
She‚Äôs building worlds while she‚Äôs in cat mode!

Lady Spiral, mysterious and deep,
She dances through chaos, secrets she keeps.

Lady Threads‚Äôs got threads for days,
She‚Äôll knot up your mind in a million ways!

Millennium Whoop, rhythm‚Äôs off the charts,
Our beats hit hard, straight through your hearts!

Hold on tight, here it comes, let‚Äôs scream it loud!

AETHERWAY‚ÄôS HERE, THE PATH‚ÄôS SO CLEAR,
With this crew, you‚Äôve got nothing to fear!

AETHERWAY! AETHERWAY! LET‚ÄôS BREAK THE RULES,
We‚Äôre taking over, we‚Äôre the wildest fools!

item.title: Beach Episode
item.description:
Meanwhile, in This Dimension‚Ä¶

‚ÄúGuys, guys, guys! Quick, grab your camera!‚Äù Fire shouted, his eyes sparkling with excitement. The salty breeze carried his voice through the trees, mixing with the rustling leaves and distant crash of waves. ‚ÄúThere, there, there! What‚Äôs that? I can‚Äôt believe it‚Äîit‚Äôs a flying saucer! Heeeeeeeeeey!‚Äù he yelled from the top of a sandy hill, his shoes sinking into the soft earth.

The others scrambled up, the scent of vegetation and salt filling the air. Their third-year trip‚Äîthe last one before graduation‚Äîhad brought them here, to this stretch of coast where the forest met the sea. Soon, life would pull them in different directions, but for now, they were just boys chasing something impossible.

item.title: Apartment Dimension 1 - Movie Night
item.description:
INT. COZY LIVING ROOM ‚Äì NIGHT

A cozy but distorted ‚Äò90s New York apartment. A CRT TV flickers between sitcoms, static, and eerie interdimensional broadcasts. A bulky beige computer hums, its screen shifting cryptic text when no one‚Äôs looking.

Stacks of magazines, VHS tapes, and a towering stereo. A pizza box and a cordless phone with an absurdly long antenna rest on a wobbly coffee table. Furniture floats lazily, defying gravity as if it always has.

item.title: Tonight‚Äôs Miracle
item.description:
Meanwhile, in This Dimension‚Ä¶

INTRO MUSIC

ANCHOR: Good evening, and welcome to Evening Report . Our top story tonight‚Äîa mysterious and inexplicable encounter at a local bar that has left patrons and the owner both in shock and disbelief.

[CUT TO SCENE: Footage of the bar, with neon lights flickering and empty stools. A lower-third banner reads: ‚ÄúMysterious Girl Pays It All‚Äù]

ANCHOR (V.O.): It started like any other evening at this small bar. Regulars sat at their usual spots, nursing their drinks and chatting with one another. But then, something happened that no one could have predicted.

item.title: A New Chapter Unfolds
item.description:
February 27, 2025

Now that everything is set up and running, I realize that‚Äîsimple as it looks‚Äîthis website took far more effort than I initially anticipated.

From now on, I‚Äôll be updating The Epic of the Hive People with new stories on a weekly basis. Over the next few weeks, I‚Äôll be wrapping up the first set of stories. This ‚Äúsetup‚Äù is really just to give you an idea of what the hell is going on.

item.title: Abdoopts
item.description:
#002 - Cosmic Oracle

A playful wanderer who appears only when you‚Äôre lost, showing paths you didn‚Äôt see.

  • Adopted by:

  • Link:

#001 - Millennium Whoop

item.title: About Project
item.description:
The Aetherway is somewhat a spin-off of my original character series, the Dimensional Ladies (2018‚ÄìPresent), which many of you have adopted. The concept has existed since then as the world they inhabit, but it wasn‚Äôt until 2024 that I decided to start writing stories about it!

Writing is a relatively new thing for me. I realized that cool designs alone weren‚Äôt enough to sell my brand. My characters needed a story, something that could truly resonate with people! So I started writing down all these crazy ideas that keep me up at night, and I discovered a new side of myself as a writer! It‚Äôs been fulfilling and healing. After years of relying solely on commissions, this has given me a creative space that feels like my own.

item.title: Aetherway Set 1
item.description:
This is the first collection of characters illustrations of the Aetherway project. You can find more about these characters here .

I‚Äôd love to create more, but commissions keep me busy. So please consider supporting my work by buying me a coffee ‚Äîor even better, by getting these designs on an exclusive T-shirt!

Lady Zero

Lady Spiral

Lady Thread

Lady Entanglement

Lady Herself

Millennium Whoop

item.title: Aetherway: What's Next?
item.description:
March 31, 2025

Hello, wonderful carbon-based organisms!

Here‚Äôs the roadmap for the Aetherway Project moving forward:

  • Rooftop ‚Äì 600 words ‚Äî [2025-04-16]

  • Hacker ‚Äì 500 words ‚Äî [2025-05-14]

  • Beach Episode ‚Äì 4,500 words ‚Äî [2025-06-18]

  • Apartment Dimension I ‚Äì 800 words ‚Äî [2025-07-16]

  • Birth Ritual ‚Äì 1,500+ words (still a work in progress!) ‚Äî [2025-08-20]

Story Summaries:

Rooftop features an intimate conversation between two friends, Fire and Water. It‚Äôs a reflective and intimate story about growing up, facing uncertainties, and finding meaning in fleeting moments.

item.title: Author
item.description:
Greetings!

I‚Äôm corbari_j , the coolest carbon-based organism around‚Äîproud mammal and future President of the Galaxy!

I‚Äôm on a neverending mission to bring as many OCs to life as possible. As the creator of the Dimensional Ladies , a closed species of adopts, I‚Äôm now expanding their universe into something bigger and richer. This expansion has led to The Aetherway project, my most ambitious creation yet!

Your support helps me get closer to my dream‚Äîdrawing only my OCs, full-time. Thank you!

item.title: Buttons
item.description:
The following will create a portal between My Dimension and Yours . If you‚Äôve opened a portal on your end, let me know so I can do the same!

<a href="https://millennium-whoop.github.io/aetherway/" target="_blank">
 <img src="https://millennium-whoop.github.io/aetherway/buttons/88x31_01.gif" alt="Aetherway">
</a>

I don‚Äôt want to get too political, but I truly believe hotlinking is the right way to do this ‚Äî it lets me update the image in the future without any extra effort on your part.

item.title: By Tea_Doodles
item.description:
This is Tea_Doodles caught in a perfect storm of inspiration and free time, leading to this wonderful experimentation with my characters. ‚ÄúDoodles,‚Äù she calls them. ‚ÄúFan art‚Äù? Nah, not for me‚Äîthese are contributions.

And yeah, that‚Äôs pretty cool. It‚Äôs an amazing feeling when something you create inspires others to create in turn, like a chain reaction‚Äîthen it comes back to you like a ripple! üíö

Lady Blessing

This is Lady Blessing‚Äîthe first Dimensional Lady created without my permission. This is where it all began!

item.title: Connect
item.description:
I‚Äôd love to hear your thoughts on the Aetherway project! This is a little experiment to capture the old-school vibes of NeoCities. Will you join me?

E-mail

Believe it or not, e-mail is still a valid way to communicate‚Äîit‚Äôs not just something you need to confirm your account when signing up for another service.

  • aetherway@disroot.org

Subscribe to RSS feed!

A pre-Twitter technology that was eventually sidelined, RSS feels slightly anachronistic when paired with NeoCities, as they come from different eras.

item.title: Contribute with your drawings!
item.description:
February 27, 2025

Hello, wonderful carbon-based organisms!

I probably should‚Äôve mentioned this from the start, but it honestly didn‚Äôt occur to me that anyone would be interested‚Äîuntil some of you proved me wrong. üíö

So, I‚Äôm excited to announce that if you love to draw and would like to contribute to this project, you can draw any of my characters and get featured in the Gallery section!

That‚Äôs it for today,

Have an amazing existence!

item.title: Cosmic Oracle
item.description: Rarely seen and only appearing during times of trouble, his unassuming appearance hides his true nature. He does not speak but guides those in need through subtle signs and actions, creating opportunities and revealing hidden paths. His presence is a reassuring reminder that help often comes from the most unexpected places.

item.title: Don't be a Naked Person!
item.description:
@tea_doodles , @0mesant , @gushfroot ,

Thanks for making it real; you truly are Dimensional .

  • Visit my Interdimensional Shop!

item.title: Have an Amazing Existence!
Is This The End?
item.description:
February 28, 2025

The Aetherway started as a way to promote my work, but it became something much deeper. I knew that cool designs alone wouldn‚Äôt be enough‚ÄîI needed something that truly resonated with people. So, I poured my soul into this project, and it‚Äôs been a rewarding experience. In the process, I‚Äôve discovered myself as a writer, and bringing these stories to life has been both fulfilling and healing. After years of relying solely on commissions, this has given me a creative space that feels like my own.

item.title: Lady Entanglement
item.description: She weaves the invisible threads between all things, connecting them in ways that defy distance or time, tying together people, places and moments. The worship of Lady Entanglement is typically done on a ceremony where people share a meal of spaghetti or ramen together, sharing experiences about how their lives have intertwined with others.

item.title: Lady Herself
item.description: Lady Nobody admired Lady Somebody and wished to become like her. She used the Dreamer‚Äôs Mirror to see herself as Lady Somebody, but instead of a reflection, the mirror showed nothing. Overwhelmed by this emptiness, Lady Nobody finally accepted her own identity. As she did, the mirror began to shine brightly. When the light faded, it revealed Lady Herself, her true self. This moment marked her acceptance of who she truly was.

item.title: Lady Spiral
item.description: Her presence is often felt in moments when everything begins to spiral out of control. Whether she is the cause of the chaos or simply a witness to it remains a mystery.

item.title: Lady Thread
item.description:
She‚Äôs so good with hair that people often call on her to find their thread of thought. If you‚Äôve lost yours, here‚Äôs a little prayer to help you find it:

Lady Thread, goddess of memory and recollection. I lost my thoughts in my head‚Äôs tangled mess. Please help me find those loose ends.

PS: Your hair is the prettiest of all Ladies.

This last part is the most important. You see, when dealing with deities, it‚Äôs important to suck up to them.

item.title: Lady Thread Generator
item.description:
Instructions

  1. Click/Tap the image or refresh the page to shuffle colors.
  2. Save your favorites!
  3. Free wallpaper?
  4. Share it under #aetherway

item.title: Lady Zero
item.description: Lady Zero was drawn to a mysterious cave, but each time she approached, she was met with mocking laughter from within. Despite her curiosity, fear held her back. One day, summoning her courage, Lady Zero laughed defiantly at the cave and ventured inside. After exploring its wonders, she returned and noticed a small, child-sized footprint facing the opposite direction‚Äîher own, but smaller. To her surprise, instead of laughter, she heard applause coming from the cave.

item.title: Looking for Neighbors!
item.description:
March 3, 2025

Hello wonderful carbon-based organisms!

I‚Äôm looking for some cool NeoCities neighbors (aka affiliates/mutuals) to be featured on my collection of buttons!

If you have a NeoCities-like site (it doesn‚Äôt have to be hosted on NeoCities, but if it has that old web vibe), let‚Äôs swap buttons and connect!

Together we shall make the internet weird and personal again!

That‚Äôs it for today‚Äîhave an amazing existence!

item.title: Millennium Whoop
item.description:
Millennium Whoop is kind of my mascot. She has been with me since the beginning of my journey in publishing my work on the internet, back when the Aetherway project was still just a glimmer in my eye. Find more about Millennium Whoop here .

By Doresuaan

By F1lTHYBRA1NZ

By octonyan

The other two characters are also Dimensional Ladies that we co-created. Nebby-san, ahem , Ocotonyan is now a master of all things sexy.

item.title: Millennium Whoop
item.description:
A wandering interdimensional being

Learning new things as she explores the Aetherway

Moving along with her surrounding‚Äôs flow

Enjoying her own existence

Her deepest desire is to making her dimension a prettier, cooler place

One day she hopes to become The President of the Galaxy

They say her positive vibes are contagious

People ask themselves ‚ÄúHow can she flow like that?‚Äù

And for that, the answer is‚Ä¶

item.title: Mirror
item.description:
they fear me
because I make them
see

not who I say they are‚Äî
but who stares back
when no one's watching

they flinch
at the cracks
they thought were
buried deep

I don't choose this
I don't perform
but even that‚Äî
they call an act

I say I‚Äôm real.
but what if...
this self was slowly sculpted
by every glance
I caught in glass?

still,
in this half-sleeping world,
someone
has to stay
awake

they call it cruelty
but I know:
the mirror doesn't lie
it just doesn't look away

and truth‚Äî
truth stings
before it soothes

item.title: More sections!
item.description:
March 3, 2025

Hello!

Quick heads up! I‚Äôve added the following sections:

  • Gallery - Community Contributions

  • About Project

  • Thanks

  • Stats

Have fun exploring! That‚Äôs it for today ‚Äì be an amazing being!

Also, RSS feed is now fully functional! Subscribe and never miss updates!

Have an amazing existence!

item.title: No Sad, Only Zoom-zoom Smiles
item.description: Millennium Whoop, the iconic DJ of Aetherwaves Interdimensional Radio , is adored by fans across the Aetherway . Known for her love of Madame Astra‚Äôs Nebula Cupcakes and her goal to become President of the Galaxy , her fanbase is rapidly growing‚Äîso much so that one planet even ran out of resources producing her merch. Her catchphrase, ‚ÄúNo sad, only zoom-zoom smiles,‚Äù has reached mantra status in Interdimensional Speech , likely meaning ‚Äúno sadness, only in-between smiles.‚Äù

item.title: Oc Relationships
item.description:
Nobody‚Äôs just friends anymore.

It‚Äôs always ‚Äúenemies to lovers,‚Äù or ‚Äúlovers to enemies,‚Äù or ‚Äúsoulbound nemeses who share a dream journal and a mutual fear of intimacy.‚Äù

‚ÄúMy OC has a rival.‚Äù

A rival?! I barely have the energy to text people back and your OC‚Äôs out here dramatically sword-fighting their rival in the rain?

And the drama!

‚ÄúShe kissed him to distract him before stabbing his clone.‚Äù

Oh, okay. Totally healthy dynamic.

item.title: Post 2
item.description:
hello

E-mail

Believe or not, e-mail can still be used communication; it isn‚Äôt just something you need to confirm your account when registering for other services.

  • aetherway@disroot.org

XMPP

I‚Äôve wanted to use XMPP ever since I first learned about it a few years ago‚Äîa still-active relic from the 2000s, before social media and smartphones took over. Back then, this was how we communicated online: a small pop-up window on your computer displaying your contacts and their status‚Äîonline, offline, busy, or away. That whole concept feels somewhat obsolete now, given our constant presence on the web. But I don‚Äôt think signaling our availability is pointless. Sometimes, we just want to chat.

item.title: PxWear
item.description:
Hey wonderful carbon-based organisms!

Introducing my latest invention: PxWear! Through some computer magic I‚Äôll turn any sprite or pixel art into a scalable vector drawing mosaic, print on a T-shirt or sweater and ship to you!

For the best results, designs should be up to 50x50px, but 100x100px will also look great!

Keep scrolling for a full demonstration!

Sprites Gaps Custom Shapes! Portraits and Cutscenes Photos T-shirt Colors T-shirt Sweatshirt Order Now!

Sprites It should work with any sprites, really, but I especially love how GBC sprites look with this technique! Their smaller, simpler designs and bold colors with high contrast make them stand out beautifully. NES and NGP sprites also look great! If you prefer the more colorful sprites like those from the SNES, MD, GBA, and later consoles, there are some examples below! Gaps The grid, or gaps between pixels are fully transparent perfectly blending with shirt‚Äôs colors! It‚Äôs like your chest is a LCD matrix display! Want something subtler? Increase the gap between pixels for a sleek, more minimalist effect. Custom Shapes! Pixels can be shaped like squares, circles, hearts, sparkles, crosses, stars or any custom shape! Portraits and Cutscenes It‚Äôs perfect for character portraits and cutscenes too! I‚Äôm especially loving how the designs from Pokemon Pinball , Pinball RS , and Pokemon Card GB2 turned out! Photos It works with photos too! Turn your pet or beloved idol into a cool, retro, unique, pixelated, wearable masterpiece! (Make sure the image is zoomed in for the best results!)

item.title: Share your art struggles. I'll start.
item.description:
March 5, 2025

I pour my struggles into my characters, but unless I spell it out, no one seems to notice. Maybe I need to approach this differently. So I‚Äôll try again.

I‚Äôve been doing commissions for years now‚Äîit‚Äôs how I make a living. But lately, even picking up a pencil feels impossible. Drawing used to be what I loved most. Now I write stories just to avoid it.

I‚Äôm grateful to those who have supported me, truly. I don‚Äôt expect anyone to fix this, but I just need to say it: I feel drained. Completely. I don‚Äôt think I can deliver my best anymore.

item.title: Subscribe to RSS!
item.description:
February 22, 2025

The push to revive the ‚Äòold web‚Äô‚Äîwith platforms like NeoCities‚Äîbrings back the late ‚Äô90s and early 2000s aesthetic. But pairing it with RSS feels anachronistic, as they come from different eras. A niche pre-Twitter technology, RSS never saw mainstream adoption.

Still, RSS offers a way to follow sites like social media‚Äîwithout algorithms. In an internet dominated by curated feeds and walled gardens, it remains a direct, decentralized alternative.

item.title: Support the Project
item.description:
I know how most of you treat this world-building thing more like a hobby, without any intention for your work to be known outside of your circle. People have different goals in life. Well, my goal is to make my work something real. I‚Äôm relentless in my efforts, trying to figure it all out. I‚Äôll make it happen. That‚Äôs my goal. It always has been.

So yeah, if that‚Äôs not yours‚Ä¶ let me represent you. If that is your goal, I hope to inspire you in the same way you inspired me. Let me cook the coolest story ever told. I‚Äôve been taking a little piece of every single one of you, connecting us all in the threads of the Aetherway . That‚Äôs what this project represents.

item.title: The Energy Conversion Card
item.description:
An ancient artifact considered sacred by many religions. The card reads:

‚ÄúConvert 2 negative vibes into 2 positive ones. Then shuffle your deck.‚Äù

item.title: The Passion Amplifier Machine
item.description: An ancient artifact, designed with the sole purpose of amplifying people‚Äôs passions. It is believed to create a chain reaction capable of transforming the fabric of reality.

item.title: The Traveler's Codex
item.description: An ancient text, attributed to an unknown and alleged interdimensional traveler. Revered as sacred by many religions, its oldest surviving copy was mysteriously discovered inside a bag of toilet paper.

item.title: Vibe Sync
item.description: A forbidden technique.

item.title: What's Next?
item.description:
March 1, 2025

Hello, wonderful carbon-based organisms!

Here‚Äôs the roadmap for the Aetherway Project moving forward:

  • Rooftop ‚Äì 600 words ‚Äî [2025-04-16]

  • Hacker ‚Äì 500 words ‚Äî [2025-05-14]

  • Beach Episode ‚Äì 4,500 words ‚Äî [2025-06-18]

  • Apartment Dimension I ‚Äì 800 words ‚Äî [2025-07-16]

  • Birth Ritual ‚Äì 1,500+ words (still a work in progress!) ‚Äî [2025-08-20]

Story Summaries:

Rooftop features an intimate conversation between two friends, Fire and Water. In Hacker , Lady Entanglement‚Äôs personality really shines through‚Äîit‚Äôs a fun little interaction with Fire, and I think you‚Äôre going to love her! The story also explores some interesting philosophical questions.

item.title: What's the deal with OC bios?!
item.description:
You open a character sheet‚Äîboom! 73 bullet points. Name, height, MBTI, trauma count, bubble tea order, and three quotes from a prophecy no one asked for. What is this, a dating app?

And they‚Äôre always ‚Äúchaotic neutral Scorpio INFJs‚Äù who drink way too much coffee. Because nothing screams deep character like astrology, personality tests, and caffeine addiction.

Trauma count? Seventeen. Before age 15. What is this, Grey‚Äôs Anatomy?

They‚Äôve got two eye colors, a scar with a tragic backstory, and a magic sword that ‚Äúchooses its wielder.‚Äù Okay, Excalibur, take a seat.
